name.baseName: Steam/hot water/other ; Biomass fuel ; Layer-fired furnace - biomass scattering ; All sizes; NESPS2
蒸汽/热水/其它 ; 生物质燃料 ; 层燃炉-生物质散烧 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
technology.technologicalApplicability: 蒸汽/热水/其他生物质燃料层燃炉的设计适用于不同规模的生物质散烧。该技术旨在为不同行业提供热能。所描述的末端治理技术，如布袋过滤器、静电除尘器和多种形式的除尘技术，用于控制和减少生物质燃烧过程的污染排放。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码4430文件，在完整版文件中第5449页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isElectric-bag composite precipitator，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.7
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是电袋组合，其效率为99.7。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisLow NOx combustion + SCR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management79
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是低氮燃烧+选择性催化还原法（SCR），其效率为79。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisSCR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是选择性催化还原法（SCR），其效率为70。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisLow NOx combustion + SNCR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management45.4
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是低氮燃烧+选择性非催化还原法（SNCR），其效率为45.4。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisLow NOx combustion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management30
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是低氮燃烧，其效率为30。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisSNCR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management22
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是选择性非催化还原法（SNCR），其效率为22，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=脱硝设施年运行小时数/锅炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物

Pollutant indicator of sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator of sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library in the face of the most compatible flow, pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide, production coefficient note for the production coefficient of the sulfur dioxide in the production coefficient of the sulfur dioxide production coefficient table in the form of sulfur content (S%), where sulfur content (S%) expressed as a form, please modify the corresponding emissions according to the notes themselves. The form of sulfur content (S%), where sulfur content (S%) refers to the fuel received base sulfur content, expressed in the form of mass percent. For example, if the sulfur content (S%) of the fuel is 0.1%, then S=0.1. The production coefficient described in the original text is 17 S. Please revise the corresponding emissions after calculating according to the notes.

污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫，产污系数备注为产污系数表中二氧化硫的产污系数是以含硫量（S％）的形式表示的，其中含硫量（S％）是指燃油收到基硫分含量，以质量百分数的形式表示。例如燃料中含硫量（S％）为0.1％，则S=0.1。原文描述的产污系数为 17S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
